Articles.Content: Hey, I was just wondering if anyone could make a quick model/part skin for me. I need two Oscar-B fuel tanks stacked on top of each other, 2 of those stacked on top of each other, an Oscar-B sliced in half, a downsized Swivel (second liquid fuel engine) downsized to mk0 (most probe cores, tiny engines, Juno jet engine, you get the idea) as well as a nuclear version, downsized bi, tri, and quad couplers, and finally, a tiny Klaw. The mod will probably be called something like "Tiny parts". I know what I just described is TweakScale, but it would be great for people who consider that cheating.

I think Roverdude's Asteroid recycling mod has a 0.625m Klaw, Fuel Tanks Plus has the Oscar-B fuel tanks as well as lots more (with color switching!), and Lack's SXT has a Rockomax 56-8s which is a slightly larger 48-7s with slightly better stats.

Edited March 22, 2016 by legoclone09

1 hour ago, legoclone09 said:

Lack's SXT has a Rockomax 56-8s which is a slightly larger 48-7s with slightly better stats.

I need to take a look at SXT, he's been adding a lot since I stopped playing...

I need to take a look at SXT, he's been adding a lot since I stopped playing...

SXT owns.
